text: And if the place which the Lord thy God shall choose, that his name should be there, be far off, thou shalt kill of thy herds and of thy flocks, as I have commanded thee, and shalt eat in thy towns as it pleases thee.

segments.text: And if the place which the Lord thy God shall choose, that his name should be there, be
far off, thou shalt kill of thy herds and of thy flocks, as I have commanded thee, and
shalt eat in thy towns as it pleases thee.
